title: Key Fragments. (Haven't gotten any in months)
body: I've played the game for a long time now and i really enjoy the Hextech crafting system. This being said, semi-recently (around 6 months) I haven't been getting any key fragments whatsoever. I've done well in games, played champions that i own and still, absolutely nothing. I went away for a couple months when this initially happened and when i came back after not playing for a while, i got around 4-5 key fragments one after another in each game. Now that i am playing consistently again i haven't been getting any, for like 2 months again. I'd really like some way if you could fix this, because i don't think this is supposed to happen. Thank you! {{champion:115}}

replies.body:
The droprate for key fragments is more of a curve and less of a line. This means that with every key fragment that drops, the chances of the next one dropping is exponentially lower. This droprate resets approximately 30 days after you received your first key fragment. I recommend you continue to play, and if you don't see key fragments for a few more weeks, hit us up in a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Let me know if you have any other questions.

But like, its been months and i dont know why i havent been getting any? I have 6 chests. I've been getting them somewhat frequently but no key fragments? 
Even after thinking back to 30 days ago, i dont see a single one. I've had the one in my inventory thats been sitting by itself for about  2 - 2 1/2 months i feel i should of at least gotten some by now?{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

I took a look at your account and it seems you've earned multiple key fragments towards the beginning of this month. It's very likely that you'll start seeing more fragments soon after your droprate has reset.

Let me know if you have any additional concerns.
Wait what? Im constantly looking in there and i dont see any, i havent sseen them this month? Not a single one, could it be my crafting system is bugged?
I've never heard of it being bugged in this way. I suggest reaching out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can dive into this deeper with you.
Ok, thank you very much for your help! :)

Well if you be toxic or literally AFK then i don't Think you will get any CHESTs or keys. It's really weird though! My friends have been toxic and have not gotten a key or a chest for maybe a week, but months!? Oh man! That is indeed weird. Hope a rioter helps you out! good luck! :)
